Custom|[div class="w3-content w3-container" style="max-width:700px; margin-top:53px;"]
Header|Deskripsi
Paragraf|The purpose of this application is quite simple. Play as much video format as possible from your browser. From a format that can be played by a browser (such as MP4) to one that it can't (such as MKV or MPEG). It was achieved by converting video into a set of pictures and then playing it as if it were a flip book.
